intent.pattern_name: Candid Lifestyle Moment with Handwritten Caption
intent.goal: Create warm, natural lifestyle visuals with casual handwritten text overlays

content.scene_description: A toy truck in the sand.

style.overall_vibe: warm, soft, natural outdoor aesthetic with gentle lighting

subject_style.outline: white hand-drawn sticker-style outline around main subject

background_style.type: nature scenery, soft focus mountains or fields

text_style.placement: handwritten text at top or upper area of image
text_style.extra_elements: optional doodles such as arrows or spark-like lines

illustrative_elements.doodles: simple white line doodles (arrows, highlights, curves)
illustrative_elements.integration: doodles should feel naturally layered over the photo

color_palette.tones: earthy greens, browns, muted blues, warm sunlight

composition.framing: subject framed centrally or slightly offset
composition.depth: background slightly blurred for emphasis on subject
